writing_guidelines.description: Provide unique, relevant content that is truly useful to the user.
Do not add filler, fluffy or spammy content.
Repeat the product name once in the product short description.
Do not provide the same copy to multiple online retailers.

summary: The document outlines the importance of SEO in product descriptions, emphasizing the need for unique and relevant content, avoidance of filler words, and ensuring that product descriptions are unique to Walmart. It also addresses optimizing visual assets for search engines.
